function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Proximity to forest increasing infection rate","Impact":"Higher infection rate in areas with closer proximity to forest","Mitigation":"Implement measures to reduce contact with forest areas or monitor infection rates in these areas closely","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis, remote sensing, GIS mapping","People":"Residents living near forested areas","Owner":"Local government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Local park area as a potential transmission hotspot","Impact":"Higher risk of transmission in areas with larger local park areas","Mitigation":"Enforce social distancing measures in local park areas, increase cleaning and disinfection efforts","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis, location tracking, public health monitoring systems","People":"Residents using local park facilities","Owner":"Local government, park management authorities"},{"Description":"Population-weighted forest exposure and infection rates","Impact":"Population density and forest exposure may impact infection rates","Mitigation":"Implement targeted public health interventions in high-exposure areas, increase awareness and monitoring","Technologies":"Data analysis, spatial modeling, public health surveillance systems","People":"Residents in high-exposure areas","Owner":"Public health authorities, local government"}]}
